channel.title: Add name to administrative levels
channel.description:
It could be really useful to have a name element within administrative node in order to report the name of each level. Example:
<administrative code="370230" vocabulary="G1" level="2"> <name> <Narrative>Meheisa</Narrative> </name> </administrative>

item.title: Add name to administrative levels
item.dc:creator: David_Megginson
item.description:
That would align well with HXL. We allow the code via the +code attribute (e.g. #adm1 +code) and the name via the _+name+ attribute (e.g. #adm1 +name), optionally in multiple languages (#adm1+name+i_ar, #adm1+name+i_fr, etc). It would be good to be able to represent all of that in IATI when we start mapping back and forth.

D
